publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2344 Rhona Brankin: The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) (No.2) Order 2005—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) (No.2) Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Mr Andy Kerr*
S2M-2344 The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) (No.2) Order 2005 (lodged on 31 January 2005) Tavish Scott*

S2M-2344 Rhona Brankin: The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) (No.2) Order 2005—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) (No.2) Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Mr Andy Kerr, Tavish Scott
